name: Hack And Dash (AdamSeslar)
description: This game was created for the Lux Jam II, it is about a imposter robot who is trying to reach the outside world with the information they have retrieved. Robots are unable to tell the difference between you and themselves, however the laser turrets can. You must hack robots and use there bodies as shields from the lasers, you can push robots around to get them where you want them and then hack them and let the laser take care of them!
